short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sets Search Lotto as the default search engine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension sets Search Lotto as your default search engine for when you search from the address bar.

Using Search Lotto you can earn FREE entries to the UK Lotto or EuroMillions lotteries. 
 Membership is free.

Results are powered by Yahoo! so you can be sure of getting the best search experience.

You can set a different default search engine under Settings > Search engine, but you can still use the Search Lotto engine easily to earn your credits by prefixing your search term with "SL " as the search engine selector shortcut.
